With all the gloom in the news today, it's valuable to look back and remember the fun things from this school year. Fortunately, our friends at the PSA Parent Advisory Council (PAC) have us covered.

It was a wonderful, intenational, and intercultural experience! Thank you so much to Ms. Maria and Ms. Jumanah for inspiring our students at PSA.
